description: The purpose of this view is to demonstrate how to loop through a list of objects in Angular.  Data is passed to the client, and Angular repeats over the data array, setting an internal scope for each item.

data.title: Item 1
data.description: This is the first item in this list.

data.title: Item 2
data.description: This is the second item in this list.

data.title: Item 3
data.description: This is the third and last item in this list.
